title: Remake
body:
5min ago i played Lol, my team is gonna to win,but half way two person just left,and this is very unfair to us,is 3v5
I think gm should make some changes to the remake system
Every player can remake after a teammate left the game.not only at the start even the whole game,Players can type /remake and vote for remake.
And sometimes theres a player left the game after 2min,but still cant remake too,this is such a bullshits too.
Gm should probaly fix this problem,!!!

replies.body:
Feel free to leave this feedback on the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where it can be properly tracked and more likely to be seen by the teams that design these systems.

Let me know if you have any questions.

if they did that, it would be way too easy to abuse by people to avoid legitimate losses. There would also be people flaming each other, demanding that someone who loses lane should quit so the rest of the team can remake and avoid the loss. The current remake system is fine as is, imo
